mn73:26.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā vacchagotto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—yassatthāya
mn73:26.1_1: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
mn73:26.1_2: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
mn73:26.2: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
mn73:26.3: Aññataro kho panāyasmā vacchagotto arahataṁ ahosi.
mn73:27.1: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ dassanāya gacchanti.
mn73:27.2: Addasā kho āyasmā vacchagotto te bhikkhū dūratova āgacchante.
mn73:27.3: Disvāna yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
mn73:27.6: “Tenahāyasmanto mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha, evañca vadetha:
mn73:27.7: ‘vacchagotto, bhante, bhikkhu bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti—
mn73:27.8: pariciṇṇo me bhagavā, pariciṇṇo me sugato’”ti.
mn73:28.1: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato vacchagottassa paccassosuṁ.
mn73:28.2: Atha kho te bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu. Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
mn73:28.3: “āyasmā, bhante, vacchagotto bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, evañca vadeti:
mn73:28.5: “Pubbeva me, bhikkhave, vacchagotto bhikkhu cetasā ceto paricca vidito:
mn73:28.10: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
